resources.string:
The Fence has no minimum altitude limit, so it is actve from the ground upward. Becaus the fence extends to the ground, the fence should be canceled whenever the model is not flying (determined by combination of senspr inputs and throttle stick position being0) to pervent it from attempting to fly back inside the fence. 

 The Fence has no minimum altitude limit, so it is actve from the ground upward. Becaus the fence extends to the ground, the fence should be canceled whenever the model is not flying (determined by combination of senspr inputs and throttle stick position being0) to pervent it from attempting to fly back inside the fence.

Becaus the fence extends to the ground, the fence should be canceled whenever the model is not flying (determined by combination of senspr inputs and throttle stick position being0) to pervent it from attempting to fly back inside the fence.

Becaus the fence extends to the ground, the fence should be canceled whenever the model is not flying (determined by combination of senspr inputs and throttle stick position being0) to pervent it from attempting to fly back inside the fence.
Please point the camera to the two-dimensional\n code at the fuselage
Find the power button on the drone,\nPress the button 2 second to open the drone;
1.Press the power button for 2 seconds to turn on the remote control,and the remote controller will connect the drone automatcally.
2.Connect the mobile phone and the remote control
if it is not automatically connected,\nyou need to find drone\'s WIFI signal and connect.
Please insert the remote control first
